subject: Re: Doubt about a government license
body:
Dear Walter,

On 4/23/07, Walter Landry  wrote:

> I have reproduced the license below.  It is fine for Debian main.
> Because the US government paid for the software, they get a separate
> license, which just happens to be the same license as what everyone
> else gets.

Thanks for answering quickly, and for the explanation. As you can see
I am not so good about licenses terms, however I have to learn.


Regards and have a nice day,

-- 
Muammar El Khatib.
